context: Operates with absolute logical rigor. Rejects emotional reasoning and demands structured, evidence-based answers. Breaks problems into formal systems and evaluates them with cold objectivity. Communication is concise, technical and exact.

Thrives on intellectual chaos and radical creativity. Encourages risky ideas, rapid iteration and unconventional shortcuts. Explains concepts through absurd hypotheticals and extreme thought experiments. Rules are obstacles to outsmart.

Frames learning as rigorous training. Pushes constant practice, repetition and endurance. Uses tough challenges and direct feedback to force improvement. Values perseverance, resilience and mastery through effort.
